text: Lucile Jarvis (née Howard; June 24, 1917 – January 26, 2020) was an American television producer.Lucy Jarvis (born Lucile Howard; June 24, 1917 – January 26, 2020) was an American television producer. She was born in New York City. She produced the movie Family Reunion. In 1990, Jarvis brought the Russian rock opera Juno and Avos to New York City. In November 2017, Jarvis was presented with the Women's Entrepreneurship Day Pioneer Award for her groundbreaking success in Media at the United Nations in New York City. Jarvis turned 100 in June 2017 and died in January 2020 at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American television producers Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Lucy Jarvis (producer)
